data.text:
Lester Bowles Pearson (23 April 1897 - 27 December 1972) was a Canadian politician, scholar, soldier, and diplomat who served as the 14th Prime Minister of Canada from 1963 to 1968.

Popular Culture[]

Appearances[]

Variants[]

The following list is of explicit appearances of Lester B. Pearson.

Year Name Appearance Notes 2002 Lester B. Pearson

Trudeau: The Man, The Myth, The Movie

Pearson was portrayed by William Parsons.

Pierre Elliott Trudeau was portrayed by Colm Feore, John Turner by Karl Pruner, Jean Chrétien by Guy Richer, and Justin Trudeau by Brendan Hanrahan.

2017 Lester Pearson

Group of 7

Pearson is recruited by John McCrae to go on a secret mission during the Battle of Vimy Ridge, alongside Norman Bethune, Conn Smythe, A.Y. Jackson, Frederick Banting, and Francis Pegahmagabow.[1]
